name: Lazer Blazer (Strange Angle Studios)
description:
Requires an Xbox controller to play.

  • Left Thumbstick - Move the Hive
  • Right Thumbstick - Move the Cursor
  • Left Trigger - Harvest Tile
  • Right Trigger - Build Wall
  • 'B' Button - Cancel last order
  • Press Right Thumbstick - Cancel order under cursor

Order your ants to harvest tiles to collect resources, and then use those resources to construct walls to protect the hive and tiles from the lasers as they will 'burn' tiles so they cannot be harvested for some time.

The objective of the game is to hold out as long as possible.
